inputs.remark: 缺少V2 Otology Follow-up (2 months post-initial evaluation) 和V3 Neurology Consultation

logic_summary: Added V2 Otology Follow-up encounter (2 months post-initial) detailing continued drop attacks and prescription of diuretics.
Added V3 Neurology Consultation encounter detailing the diagnosis of migrainous vertigo.

history.present_illness: Patient reported continued 'drop' attacks (sudden spontaneous falls when walking or standing).

value.management: Prescribed diuretic (Maxzide) and encouraged to continue sodium and caffeine restrictions. No amplification recommended at this time. Scheduled for re-evaluation in 6 months with an accompanying audiogram.

value.assessment: Diagnosed with migrainous vertigo in addition to Meniere's disease.
